translation: Yylhi Allah tʿālyā sund mdd yiyhi byyhi sapdi ftḥ nṣyb (mʿtbr rvaytav mṭạbq chuh yih qrān mjyduk sarive khoth ạkhry svrh yus ḥẓvr ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn hndi vfat pth tqrybaan 3 ryth brvntth nạzl spud, aamhi pth spdụ̄ kynhh āyat nạzl mgr pvur svrh spud nh kanhh nạzl).
Th (ae nby) tvhụ̄ vuchihv zi lukh chih fvj dr fvj Allah tʿālyā sndis dyins mnz dạkhl spdan.

Tamhi saʿth kriv pnnis rb sndi ḥmd san tmụ̄ snz tsbyḥ, byyhi mngiv ts mghfrtuk dʿā (yithi chuh rvaytav nishhi pae lgan zi yih svrh nạzl spdnh pth ạsụ̄ ḥẓvr pnnyn ạkhry dohn andr zyadh ḥmd v tsbyḥ th astghfar kran rvudimtụ̄) be shk chuh suh bvdd tvbh qbvl krn vvl.
